title: Scattered Spider hackers shift focus to aviation, transportation firms
summary: Hackers associated with Scattered Spider tactics have expanded their targeting to the aviation and transportation industries after previously attacking insurance and retail sectors [...]

title: Over 1,000 SOHO Devices Hacked in China-linked LapDogs Cyber Espionage Campaign
summary:
Threat hunters have discovered a network of more than 1,000 compromised small office and home office (SOHO) devices that have been used to facilitate a prolonged cyber espionage infrastructure campaign for China-nexus hacking groups.
The Operational Relay Box (ORB) network has been codenamed LapDogs
